initialText: You say without fear nor doubt "Who of you ladies know the name of this beautiful city" (what a foolish thing to say). They all get up looking angry and go straight at ya. You:

decisions.result: You dumbass, you just woke up. You can't run that easy.

decisions.text: Say "Oh shit" and try to punch one of them
decisions.result: C'mon, they're HUGE! Look at them! They'll knock you out.
